thread.title: 5 Marvel Stories That Would Make Great Animated Movies
thread.title_full: 5 Marvel Stories That Would Make Great Animated Movies

author: Jamie Lovett
title: 5 Marvel Stories That Would Make Great Animated Movies
text:
5 Marvel Stories That Would Make Great Animated Movies Jamie Lovett Start Slideshow Slide of 
Marvel Studios may have gotten a head start at the box office over DC Films, but DC Animation has long been the king of superhero animated features. 
What if that changed? Marvel Animation recently adapted the popular Civil War storyline into a four-episode animation event on Marvel's Avengers: Ultron Revolution . That got us thinking about what other classic Marvel stories could make for fun animated adaptations. 
Here we present five stories that we would be happy to see Marvel put to animation. We tried to stay away from retreading stories that have already been adapted to live action. Let us know what stories you'd like to see adapted by Marvel Animation in the comments.
